Plot: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.
Writer: Rick Moody (based upon the novel by), James Schamus (screenplay by)
Actors: Kevin Kline, Joan Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Henry Czerny
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 30 nominations.
Title: The Ice Storm
